content.rendered:
Matthias is a Naval Architect with over 30 years maritime experience which includes Exclusive Class Surveyor (GL), Maritime Administration Surveyor, Superintendent on Tankers, Special experience in H&M damage, Shipyard Liability Surveys, Condition and Loading Surveys, Lead Surveyor for Shipyard Builders Risk Surveys (JH143), Special Expertise in traditional built Wooden Boats and Mega Yachts.

Contact

Bremerhaven | +49 17 0271 8277

Discipline: Naval Architect
Specialism: Risk Assessments for newbuilds, conversions and repairs
Expert Witness Expertise: Written expert opinion
